title: Dragon Trainer Heimerdinger Removed?
body:
I just saw that dragon trainer heimerdinger was availible on the league screen.  I just bought twenty bucks in rp for it and ITS GONE!!! What the heck?  I don't see it anywhere now and feel crazy.  Bring it back!!!

{{champion:74}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3151}}

replies.body: Send a support ticket, boards cant do anything about it.
